bibl.title: with contributions by J. CHAPA, D. OBBINK, P.J. PARSONS, A. SYRKOU, V. GIANNOPOULOU, D. KRASNE, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXX (Nos 4759-4802).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXX, 4759-4802. - I. Theological Text (4759). - II. New Literary Texts (4760-4762). - III. Known Literary Texts (4763-4771). - IV. Documentary Texts (4772-4802). - V. Pp. 133-146: Appendix. Full text of seven of the descripta in volume XVI that are closely connected with 4780-4802 [documents from the dossier of the 'Apion family']: 1985, 1987-1991, 1993.

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: GONIS N., J.D. THOMAS, R. HATZILAMBROU, with contributions by J. CHAPA, D. OBBINK, P.J. PARSONS, A. SYRKOU, V. GIANNOPOULOU, D. KRASNE, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXX (Nos 4759-4802). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 90.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2006, 8°, xii-164 pp. et XVI pll. coul. ISBN 0-85698-173-7. £65.

Gonis Thomas Hatzilambrou Chapa Obbink Parsons Syrkou Giannopoulou Krasne
